reviewText: Bought this as a ride along, going to save it.  I buy gifts to keep on hand.
my 1 year old nephew love these dvd shows he watch them all the time
My boys love Word World. Great Christmas present and educational too!

Educational and entertaining at the same time. My toddler lovers this program and has learned to spell many words with it. Of course for your child to get the max out of this program they should have a good foundation of letter recognition and associated sounds. It is awesome!
Word World is a brilliant television show that helps early readers with word recognition and sounding out words in a fun way. My youngest loves watching this show.

AWESOME!!!!!  Love the ability this DVD has to simplify spelling for the kids.  They love it.  Most have learned some of the songs on the DVD to remember how to spell certain words or remember certain letters.
Thank you, a gift for a Grandchild.

Wordworld is amazing. My 3 year old son is spelling words and talking about word families. My 2 year old is equally as enchanted. This particular video has Christmas and winter tales full of the typical cute songs and nice lessons. I would highly recommend this to any toddler mom!
I love word world more than my nephew. Very educational and entertaining
Love all of the word world series, what a teaching tool and is making learning fun for our great grandson,  he is 3 and is able to read one and two syllable words.
